The variety of colors available also allows for easy coordination with different outfits, making these shirts a versatile addition to any wardrobe.  While the sizing tends to run slightly small, this can be easily managed by ordering a size up. Overall, these dress shirts offer excellent value for money and have become a staple in my collection. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for stylish, comfortable, and versatile dress shirts.

Cons: • I had to iron it after washing it to get the initial wrinkles out • It does not have collar stays - neither the removable kind nor the sewn-in kind • The fabric is quite thin and a little too revealing for my husband's taste • The collar points are really too short to wear with a tie unless it is a very skinny tie • He really missed having the breast pocket more than he thought he would

I was looking for a really nice dress shirt that can be worn casually as well. I chose this EOUOSS Dress Shirt as it looked like a great shirt.  It is light in weight and feels like silk but it is a mix of Polyester, Cotton and Spandex. It has a nice button down collar and long sleeves that go down to a 2 button cuff. The shirt buttons all the way down and it has no pockets which is unusual and I like it. It has a tuck in shirt tail making it look better tucked in rather than left out. However, for those casual times it can be left untucked.  It comes in a variety of colors and I chose the beige which appears more like ivory. I ordered my normal size and it fit accordingly.  I'm looking forward to wearing this the next time my wife and I go out to dinner.
This shirt is comfy and classic looking, though thin looking

评论概述: Works for both formal and casual occasions
评论详情: As someone who values both comfort and style, this shirt ticks all the right boxes. The slim fit is spot-on. It hugs my body without feeling restrictive, thanks to the stretch fabric. Whether I’m sitting in meetings or moving around the office, I never feel constricted. The blend of cotton and polyester ensures flexibility without compromising on the professional look. This shirt seamlessly transitions from business meetings to after-work gatherings. Pair it with dress slacks and a tie for a formal look, or roll up the sleeves and leave the top button undone for a more relaxed vibe. The solid color makes it easy to match with various suits and ties. The button-down collar stays crisp, and the stitching is impeccable. I appreciate the attention to detail—the buttons are securely attached, and the seams are reinforced. Plus, the non-iron feature saves me precious time in the morning. The shirt strikes the perfect balance between comfort and sophistication. Whether you’re a business professional or simply want to elevate your casual wardrobe, this shirt is a must-have. Trust me; you won’t be disappointed.

评论概述: For the cheapest dress shirt ever - surprisingly nice!
评论详情: I was blown away at the price of this dress shirt... I thought for sure that this would just end up being a throw-away dress shirt but I was completely blown away at how nice it is for this price! It's not a $15 shirt that's really like a $100 shirt... it's more like a $40-50 quality shirt, but still!! That's a great deal. I own a ton of very nice performance dress shirts and I have to say that this would not be noticed apart from many of the bigger brand name shirts I own. It's really comfortable, it fit incredibly well, and there's no loose threads or weird cuts or anything at all... I have to say... I would be totally cool owning a few more of these, especially for this insanely cheap price point!

This shirt looks so flattering on! I got it for my husband to wear to work and it looks great! The color is a nice, dark blue, and yes I would say it is navy. The fit is perfect, so go with your usual size. There is an adequate amount of room in the sleeves for comfortable arm movement, and the torso and chest areas look like they fit well. Over a couple of washings, I haven’t noticed any problems - it doesn’t seem to loose or transfer color in the cold wash, and the fabric still feels the same. It doesn’t wrinkle as easily as I expected,and I haven’t taken an iron to it (basically just tumble dry and then hang right away). Love this shirt!
The brown one was my favorite, fits great, very comfortable and light, wrinkles come out easily, very impressed with this Stretch Shirt! nice for formal and casual occasions

This shirt is a very dark navy blue. The material is a soft and silky feeling and seems to have a little bit of stretch to the material. I ordered a size (M) and it fits true to size. Had a large pronounced collar and seems like this could be worn with a pair of jeans or dressed up with a nice pair of slacks as well. A nice value for the money. I haven't worn it yet other than trying it on and haven't washed/dry cleaned it yet so I don't know how it will hold up b I would have no problem recommending this shirt.

The shirt fits well but the collar has no substance and just lies there. A shirt collar very often determines how the shirt looks in general, especially one billed as a "dress shirt", and when it's just loose and floppy, it's hard to wear it under a sport jacket and have it look nice. Maybe I could wear it on the beach as just a very casual shirt???

评论概述: Not too thin, good slim fit
评论详情: UPDATE WITH PHOTOS:  It irons out really easily, and I love how it fits!At 6ft, 150 lbs, I ordered a Small.  It fits just right, and is well tailored for my build.  Other shirts I've had that were not slim fit tend to have too much material around the waist.  This one is much cleaner looking.  I was pleased to see that while it is thin like other dress shirts, it is not so thin that you can see things through it.  Also, fresh out of the package I expect creases, which it had, but compared to other shirts it didn't have many.  I take that as a good sign that it won't get as easily wrinkled.Also, it feels really nice.  Good material choice, nice fit.  Recommended!
Looks great fits great light and comfortable with stretch love it my favorite ite shirt with suit

I'm not sure what kind of measurements this manufacturer uses on their chart, but they are way off. At a 41-in chest says you would wear a small. I have a 38-in chest and got the small and it was tight on me. I ordered a medium and that fit. Of the material. It's super comfortable. I love stretchy fabric and it looks great on. The price is great as well. I would give this five stars if the sizing was right. For your reference, I'm 5'10 and weigh 180 lb. The medium fit me perfectly.

评论概述: Phenomenal Stretch Shirt with a Friendly Price
评论详情: I started using Stretch Shirts for our Midweek and Weekend Meetings because they are more comfortable, specially with a tie or a suit. I have purchased some at a premium price, such as &Collar, Nautica and JF J. Ferrar in JC Penney. So when I saw the price of this one, I told myself: "Yeah, yeah. Whatever. These more likely will not have quality or 4 way stretch". Well, I was wrong. The fabric is not only 4 way stretch, but it's also more comfortable than the Stretch Shirts I mentioned earlier. It also looks like if it was tailor made. The collar is not as wide as the Charles Tyrwhitt Shirts, but it still looks elegant with a tie. I ordered the blue one and I will order other colors, not only to attend our meetings regularly, but also for casual use during the week.

My husband likes this shirt, and it fits well. He doesn't like slim-fit shirts and can't wear his normal size, but he isn't really fond of the baggy fit from sizing up. But with this shirt, the slim-fit in a size larger is a really nice fit on him. It's tailored looking without being too snug. He is a bit between sizes L and XL, and this shirt in XL is perfect. Our only complaint is that the fabric is actually a little shiny. It's not noticeable in the ad, but in person it has a definite sheen to it. But it's lightweight and washed up well. The green color is really nice, too.

Honestly really impressed on how amazing these shirts feel and look. First the fit was perfect, as someone who has a bit of trouble finding the right fit, the collar was comfortable and fits well with some small stretch. Feels amazing and allows for easy mobility. Looks slick and feels like quality shirts that are double in price. This is a must have!
Nice long sleeve mens shirt. I actually got it for my son who is in middle schools. It fits him great and looks nice. The material is on the thinner side, but it held up in the wash.
I bought this for my work and it seems to fit me fine, so I can say the fitting is pretty accurate. Overall, the fabric is nice and it's not too light weight.

评论概述: I am obsessed with the fabric of the shirt!

评论概述: WHITE shirt arrived with blue ink stain under the tag on the collar... UNACCEPTABLE!!!
评论详情: I noticed this immediately upon removing the WHITE shirt from the package.  I have not even unbuttoned it so I can try it on to see how it fits, as once I noticed the blue mark, that was it for me!  I will never wear this!  I was going to start a return to exchange it, even though I got it for free (to review), it just seems more trouble than it's worth.  And who is to say the replacement would not also have a blue mark on the white shirt?  If they did replace it, I would ask for a dark color shirt next time.  But this one is going in the trash!  If they send me another color to replace this shirt, then I will update this review accordingly!  UPDATE (Feb 1st)... I received the replacement shirt today, and it has the exact same issue... blue ink line /spot/ stain right through the fabric, on the collar under the tag.  in fact, this shirt has an even bigger blue stain than the last one.  If I could change this to NO STARS, I would.  This shirt is horrible.  Never even got to try one on.  Both had to be sent back.  I would AVOID ORDERING THIS HORRIBLE SHIRT!!!
